page.title: 12The Yacht Centre, Craignish.
page.content: Ardfern Yacht Centre has the follow- ing facilities for yachtsmen;- water, diesel,bottled-gas and a range of chandlery. There are 70 'swinging' moorings and pontoon and slipping pro- vision. Their hoist can lift a 16 ton vessel. Car parking / Winter storage for about 50 boats on the hard. A.Y.C. employ 8 men & undertakes re -pairs (including engines), painting & anti-fouling etc. Most of the yachts that moor locally are 'pleasure' craft but larger naval vessels occasionally visit the loch and fishing boats (working the West of Scotland and Clyde sea areas) of up to 60' put in here for minor repairs or to replenish stores. The moorings offer safe shelter from the prevailing winds (usually from S.W & in Winter some N.W).Gales and strong winds from S.E can cause problems.
